messages.message: React Hook useEffect has an unnecessary dependency: 'tutorialSignal.value'. Either exclude it or remove the dependency array. Outer scope values like 'tutorialSignal.value' aren't valid dependencies because mutating them doesn't re-render the component.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [currentActivity]
